column4: Does a custom login screen have to contain a gtk-2.0 folder with a gtkrc file? Because I have a custom gdm login screen and it contains a full metacity-1 folder but it will not work do I need the gtk-2.0 folder?
custom login screens no longer work in karmic
But I'm pretty sure they work to an extent, I'm using this http://www.ubuntugeek.com/gdm2-setup-a-login-interface-management-utility-for-the-new-gdm.html#more-4036
ah, never used this - so I wouldn't know
